name: The joy of fishing
description:
Your grandfather left you a deed to his house when he died. Moving from the stress of the city to a small town far in the north, Your goal is to try to find calmness in nature and enjoy the fishing that you and your grandfather used to share together.

Without your knowledge something stirs in the depths.

----------------------------------------

You are a fisher in a lake who catches fish and explores the lake. By catching and selling fish you unlock and gain access to other parts of the lake. 

The core of the game are exploration and progression. Progression by buying upgrades and catching more valuable fish. Exploration by finding new unique fish and discovering the secrets of the lake.
